wildRespinText: When two WILDS appear on any two reels along with a blank on the other reel, the blank Reel will have a Re-Spin feature, where that reel will spin again to land a non blank symbol and assures a win.
randomWildMulText: Whenever a wild lands, there is a chance it may award a multiplier. So, whenever a wild lands, every 30 spins a multiplier is awarded from 5x ,8x or 10x.
advertiseText1: 2 WILDS TRIGGER RESPIN UNTIL YOU WIN
